DOC.brief_summary: Objective : We evaluate effectiveness strengthening exercise use Swiss ball patient fibromyalgia ( FM ) . Material Method : Sixty FM patient randomize two group : intervention group ( IG ) , patient perform muscle strength exercise use Swiss ball , stretch group ( SG ) , patient perform stretch exercise . All patient participate 40-minute training session three time per week 12 week . The IG perform follow eight strengthen exercise use Swiss ball : lateral rise , simultaneous biceps curl , squat , two arm triceps extension , abdominal , one arm dumbbell row , reverse crucifix crucifix . The SG perform exercise target muscle group train IG . Outcome measure follow : visual analogue scale ( VAS ) pain , 1 repetition maximum test muscle strength ; fibromyalgia impact questionnaire ( FIQ ) evaluate disease impact , short form health survey ( SF-36 ) ass quality life . All participant underwent evaluation baseline , 6 week 12 week training . The assessor blind patient allocation .
DOC.criteria: female fibromyalgia accord classification criterion American College Rheumatology ; age 20 65 year old . uncontrolled hypertension ; decompensated cardiac disease ; history syncope exerciseinduced arrhythmias decompensated diabetes ; severe psychiatric illness ; history regular exercise least twice week last 6 month ; condition could prevent patient perform physical exercise .
